title: My Portfolio Website
description: Building a personal portfolio with Next.js, Tailwind, and Contentlayer.

body.raw:
import Image from "next/image";

# Building My Portfolio Website

Here is a short case study describing how I built my portfolio site using modern tooling.

<Image src="/public/next.svg" alt="Next.js logo" width={100} height={100} />

More details coming soon.
